ygData.subject: Are we Hybrids?
ygData.msgSnippet: I can back this up as well with 100% certainty.  Over the past couple of months, the only casters who have died in groups I was with were both enchanters.  In
ygData.messageBody:
I can back this up as well with 100% certainty. Over the past couple of
months, the only casters who have died in groups I was with were both
enchanters. In both situations, my party got a very bad pull, the
enchanters did AE mez and ended up dying because they didn't keep the mobs
mezzed (bad move on the enchanters part) and the tanks couldn't taunt the
mobs off of them when they broke out of the mez. Not once has any other
caster class died. I don't even keep count now of the number of times I die
per level.

Galtin of E'ci


> Even if casters die more than bards (which is debatable), the
> >problem is that when casters die it's usually due to their own
> >stupidity. When bards die, it's usually due to someone else's
> >stupidity. I think I am just fine without bind, but you won't
> >see much opposition from me to getting bind.
>
> I can say for a certainty that caster's at least in my guild do not die
> anywhere near as much as other classes. We have had 3 caster deaths that
> I
> know of in the last 3 months. I alone have died twice that many times.
> Another bard in our guild died three times in one night due to stupid
> groupmates. I was luckier and only died twice due to the same groupmates.
> One of our casters hasn't died in 5 levels. He has only died 4 times in
> his
> entire career up to around level 24.
